mapper.insert: INSERT INTO area ( whs_id, are_nm, are_type, item_id, are_max, are_qty ) VALUES ( #{whs_id}, #{area_nm}, #{area_tp}, #{item_id}, #{max_cnt}, #{qty} )
mapper.select: SELECT wh.whs_his_date AS action_time, wh.whs_his_cnt AS quantity, s.det_nm AS status FROM warehouse_history wh LEFT JOIN code_detail s ON wh.whs_his_sts = s.det_id WHERE wh.are_id = #{areaId}

SELECT s.det_nm AS nm, s.det_id AS code, SUM(ar.are_qty) AS qty, ar.item_id AS item_id, COALESCE(m.mat_nm , p.prd_nm) AS item_nm, u.det_nm AS item_unit FROM area ar LEFT JOIN code_detail s ON ar.are_type = s.det_id LEFT JOIN material m ON ar.are_type = 'area_type_01' AND ar.item_id = m.mat_id LEFT JOIN product p ON ar.are_type = 'area_type_02' AND ar.item_id = p.prd_id LEFT JOIN code_detail u ON u.det_id = COALESCE(m.mat_unit, p.prd_unit) GROUP BY s.det_nm, s.det_id, ar.item_id, COALESCE(m.mat_nm , p.prd_nm), u.det_nm

SELECT ar.are_nm AS area_nm, w.whs_nm AS warehouse_nm, ad.item_id AS item_id, ad.are_det_qty AS qty, COALESCE(m.mat_nm, pr.prd_nm) AS item_nm, cd_unit.det_nm AS item_unit, cd_color.det_nm AS op_color, cd_size.det_nm AS op_size, cd_height.det_nm AS op_height FROM area ar JOIN area_detail ad ON ad.are_id = ar.are_id LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON w.whs_id = ar.whs_id LEFT JOIN material m ON ar.are_type = 'area_type_01' AND ad.item_id = m.mat_id LEFT JOIN product pr ON ar.are_type = 'area_type_02' AND ar.item_id = pr.prd_id LEFT JOIN product_option po ON ar.are_type = 'area_type_02' AND ad.item_id = po.opt_id LEFT JOIN code_detail cd_unit ON cd_unit.det_id = COALESCE(m.mat_unit , pr.prd_unit) LEFT JOIN code_detail cd_color ON cd_color.det_id = po.opt_color LEFT JOIN code_detail cd_size ON cd_size.det_id = po.opt_size LEFT JOIN code_detail cd_height ON cd_height.det_id = po.opt_height WHERE ar.item_id = #{itemId} AND ar.are_type = #{type}
